networkSetting.title: Network Settings
networkSetting.subTitle: Configure network settings for the application

captureHttps.title: Capture HTTPS Requests
captureHttps.description: Capturing HTTPS requests requires a certificate. Please ensure it's installed

filter.title: Capture Filter
filter.description: Capture filters are used to set rules for capturing requests. You can use Glob patterns to match request URLs

clientProxy.title: Client Proxy Configuration
clientProxy.description: Configure client proxy settings for proxy requests and API debugging

proxyRequests.title: Proxy Requests Client Proxy
proxyRequests.description: Set the client proxy used for proxy requests

apiDebug.title: API Debug Client Proxy
apiDebug.description: Set the client proxy used for API debugging

validation.format: Invalid proxy URL format, only http or https protocols are supported

certificate.title: Certificate Management
certificate.subtitle: Manage SSL certificates required for HTTPS capturing

installed.title: Certificate Installed Successfully
installed.description: Your system trusts this certificate and can now capture HTTPS requests.

notInstalled.title: Certificate Installation Required
notInstalled.description: To capture HTTPS requests, you need to install and trust this certificate in your system or browser.

step1.title: Download Certificate
step1.description: Download the certificate file from this page

step2.title: Install for Chrome/Chromium
step2.description: Navigate to chrome://certificate-manager/localcerts/usercerts, click "Import", and select the downloaded certificate file

step3.title: Install for Firefox
step3.description: Navigate to about:preferences#privacy, click "View Certificates", select "Import" in the "Certificate Manager", and select the downloaded certificate file

step3.title: Import Root Certificate
step3.description: Select "Place all certificates in the following store" → Click "Browse" → Select "Trusted Root Certification Authorities" → Click "Next"

step4.title: Complete Installation
step4.description: Click "Finish", then click "Yes" in the security warning dialog

step1.title: Open Keychain Access
step1.description: Search for and open "Keychain Access" in Launchpad

step2.title: Import Certificate
step2.description: Select "File" → "Import Items", choose the downloaded certificate

step3.title: Trust Certificate
step3.description: Double-click the imported certificate → Expand "Trust" → Set "When using this certificate" to "Always Trust"

step4.title: Confirm Changes
step4.description: Enter your administrator password to confirm changes

step1.title: Download Certificate
step1.description: Open the certificate download link on your mobile device

step2.title: iOS Devices
step2.description: Go to "Settings" → "General" → "Profile" → Select downloaded certificate → Tap "Install", then enable it in "Settings" → "General" → "About" → "Certificate Trust Settings"

step3.title: Android Devices
step3.description: Go to "Settings" → "Security" → "More Security Settings" → "Encryption & Credentials" → "Install Certificate" → "CA Certificate", select the downloaded certificate file

general.title: General Settings
general.subTitle: Configure basic behavior and appearance of the application

maxLogSize.title: Maximum Log Size
maxLogSize.description: Set the maximum number of logs. When exceeded, the oldest logs will be removed

validation.required: Please enter the maximum log size
validation.range: Maximum log size must be between 60 and 6000

contextMenu.addToApiDebugFailed: Failed to add to API Debug
contextMenu.noSelectedRecord: No selected request record or request data
contextMenu.noResponseData: No selected request record or response data

ruleManager.title: Interception Rules List
ruleManager.description: Manage rules for intercepting and modifying network requests

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Delete
deleteConfirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete rule "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

copyConfirm.title: Confirm Copy
copyConfirm.content: Are you sure you want to copy rule "{{name}}"?

delay.name: Delay Processing
delay.description: Add delay to request processing, simulate network latency

modifyRequest.name: Modify Request
modifyRequest.description: Modify request headers, body, method or URL

modifyResponse.name: Modify Response
modifyResponse.description: Modify response headers, body or status code

htmlScriptInjector.name: HTML Content Injector
htmlScriptInjector.description: Inject custom content into HTML responses

config.title: HTML Content Injector Configuration
config.description: This handler injects custom content into HTML responses. You can inject JavaScript scripts, CSS styles, or other HTML elements. Only works with HTML content types.

content.label: Injection Content
content.extra: Content to be injected into HTML, can be scripts, styles, or other HTML elements
content.required: Please enter the content to inject

tips.tip1: Supports injecting any HTML content including scripts, styles, meta tags, etc.
tips.tip2: Content injection occurs at the final stage of response processing to ensure HTML structure integrity
tips.tip3: Recommend injecting scripts at body end position to ensure DOM elements are loaded

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Configure basic rule attributes including name, description and execution priority
basicInfo.enableDescription: Whether the rule takes effect immediately
basicInfo.enableTooltip: The rule will not be executed when disabled
basicInfo.priorityTooltip: Higher values have higher priority, range: 0-100

captureRule.title: Capture Rule
captureRule.description: Define what kind of requests will be matched and processed by this rule
captureRule.addAtLeastOneCondition: Please add at least one condition
captureRule.globHelp: Use glob syntax to match URLs, e.g.: *.example.com/api/*
captureRule.regexHelp: Use regular expression to match URLs, e.g.: ^https://example\.com/api/.*$
captureRule.httpMethodEmptyHelp: Leave empty to match all HTTP methods
captureRule.notOperatorDescription: Match when condition is not satisfied (only one condition allowed)
captureRule.notOperatorTip: When using the NOT operator, only one condition can be added. The NOT operator matches requests that do not satisfy the condition.
captureRule.clickButtonToStart: Click the button below to add conditions

handlerBehavior.title: Handler Behavior
handlerBehavior.description: Define the processing actions to execute when requests match the rule. Multiple handlers can be added
handlerBehavior.noHandlers: No handlers yet, click the button below to add handlers

common.optionalDescription: Leave fields empty for any {{type}} items you don't want to modify

response.title: Response Configuration
response.statusCodeValidation: Status code must be between 100 and 599

blockHandler.title: Block Request Configuration
blockHandler.statusCodeRange: Status code must be between 100 and 599
blockHandler.description: The blocked request will return the specified HTTP status code and reason. Common status codes: 403 (Forbidden), 404 (Not Found), 503 (Service Unavailable)

delayHandler.title: Delay Processing Configuration
delayHandler.delayMsMin: Delay time must be greater than or equal to 0
delayHandler.varianceMsExtra: Optional, add random variance to delay, actual delay = delay time ± variance
delayHandler.description: Add delay to request processing to simulate network latency or throttle processing speed. Supports fixed delay or random delay range.

tips.tip1: Delay time is in milliseconds, 1000ms = 1 second
tips.tip2: Random variance makes delay more realistic, simulating unstable network conditions
tips.tip3: Delay type controls when the delay is applied in the request processing flow

proxyForward.title: Proxy Forward Configuration
proxyForward.description: Configure the destination address for proxy forwarding. You can specify the protocol, host/port and path of the target URL. For example, to forward requests to an internal network or other servers.

apiDebug.title: API Debug
apiDebug.clearAllHistoryWarning: This operation will delete all request history records and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to continue?
apiDebug.clearFailed: Failed to clear history, please try again
